revision.comment: /* Translations of foreign awards */ ping per BRD
revision.text:
{{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=PR |action1date=10:30, 23 February 2014 (UTC) |action1link=Wikipedia:Peer review/Heinz-Wolfgang Schnaufer/archive1 |action1result=reviewed |action1oldid=591996269 |action2=GAN |action2date=23:51, 23 February 2014 (UTC) |action2link=Talk:Heinz-Wolfgang Schnaufer/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=592050417 |action3=WAR |action3date=15:49, 6 April 2014 (UTC) |action3link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Heinz-Wolfgang Schnaufer |action3result=approved |action3oldid=603018160 |currentstatus=GA |topic=war }} {{British English}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Aviation |class=GA |A-Class=current |Biography=yes | b1 <!-- Referencing and citations --> = y | b2 <!-- Coverage and accuracy --> = y | b3 <!-- Structure --> = y | b4 <!-- Grammar and style --> = y | b5 <!-- Supporting materials --> = y }} {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=GA|military-priority=mid|military-work-group=yes|listas=Schnaufer, Heinz-Wolfgang}} {{MILHIST|class=A|A-Class=pass |portal1-name=Military of Germany |portal1-link=Selected biography/7 |Aviation=y|Biography=y|German=y|WWII=y}} {{WikiProject Germany|class=GA|importance=low}} }}
== WikiProject class rating== This article was automatically assessed because at least one WikiProject had rated the article as start, and the rating on other projects was brought up to start class. [[User:BetacommandBot|BetacommandBot]] 04:03, 9 November 2007 (UTC)
== To Misterbee1966 ==
Re: [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Heinz-Wolfgang_Schnaufer&diff=592283769&oldid=592283608 this edit]. It needs a comma to note a possessive (the record), and it doesn't read fluidly with a comma in it, which is why it was manipulated. As it stands it still needs a comma, regardless of how you want it. :Thanks fixed [[User:MisterBee1966|MisterBee1966]] ([[User talk:MisterBee1966|talk]]) 07:14, 26 January 2014 (UTC)
I think the comment on Jabs is weak. It is still not clear to me why Jabs disliked him. Is a man like Jabs really going to dislike Schnaufer over this? As his superior he could have easily had him disciplined. Besides, if it had no impact on the unit, or it's conduct of operations, why mention it in the first place? [[User:Dapi89|Dapi89]] ([[User talk:Dapi89|talk]]) 11:40, 25 January 2014 (UTC) :?? Well, probably a cultural thing, but taking someones right of way in Germany is a very emotional thing on German roads, coming very close to steeling. It is always considered a deliberate act of severe disrespect. You can ask for right of way, but it must be granted to you by a gesture or words, it is never ever taken. I can imagine that the two had more than a few words over this issue. [[User:MisterBee1966|MisterBee1966]] ([[User talk:MisterBee1966|talk]]) 07:14, 26 January 2014 (UTC)
== Sources not used for citations ==
I took out a number of sources not used for citations with [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Heinz-Wolfgang_Schnaufer&type=revision&diff=728975676&oldid=728975298 this edit]. For discussions on some of these works, please see: *[[Wikipedia_talk:WikiProject_Military_history/Coordinators/Archive_44#Helden_der_Wehrmacht]] *[[Wikipedia_talk:WikiProject_Military_history/Archive_122#Recent_deletions_of_so_called_unreliable_sources | Unreliable sources]]
Please let me know of any concerns. [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 23:41, 8 July 2016 (UTC)
== Translations of foreign awards ==
Please see the discussion here:
*[[Wikipedia:Good_article_reassessment/Hyacinth_Graf_Strachwitz/1#Translations]]. *[[Wikipedia:Good_article_reassessment/Hyacinth_Graf_Strachwitz/1#Foreign_language_terms]].
There is no need to include the foreign translation when the English lang term is predominantly used in English lang literature. Moreover, the articles on the awards are provided, so that the interested readers can click on them to get more info, including the translation. [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 17:16, 16 July 2016 (UTC)
:{{ping|Dapi89}} per [[WP:BRD]], please advise. [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 19:21, 17 July 2016 (UTC)
::::I will restore my edit per BRD since there was no response from the reverting editor. [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 02:01, 20 July 2016 (UTC) ::There is no consensus on this, that is quite blatant. It is a dead-heat with three editors (including me) clearly advocating their inclusion (of German words/terms). [[User:Dapi89|Dapi89]] ([[User talk:Dapi89|talk]]) 09:22, 22 July 2016 (UTC) {{od}} {{ping|Dapi89}} What is the encyclopedic purpose of including these translations? [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 02:32, 26 July 2016 (UTC)
:{{ping|Dapi89}} Per BRD, please advise. [[User:K.e.coffman|K.e.coffman]] ([[User talk:K.e.coffman|talk]]) 05:25, 30 July 2016 (UTC)
